subject: Re: [junit] Junit's Importance
msgSnippet: ... This depends: is the individual executing ad-hoc unit tests by hand or automating them and keeping them around for the entire life of the project? ...
messageBody:
>Can someone tell me the real advantages of using Junit over the
>individual's own Unit testing of the Java Code written by him.

This depends: is the individual executing ad-hoc unit tests by hand or
automating them and keeping them around for the entire life of the project?

>I have been
>reading the articles posted on Junit homepage. Where can I find more
>articles giving the advantages of Junit.

JUnit's site has the cream of the crop, as far as I know. Try a google
search.

J. B. Rainsberger
President, Diaspar Software Services
